Tools created for Vaaru Academy stidents to use it. 

1. VA Welcome - say hello message
2. VA Calcualtor -  Calculator Tool

----------------------------------------------------------
Usuage Example:

import vatools

vatools.sayHello()

result = vatools.subtract(43,14)
print("Result : ", result)

----------------------------------------------------------
Developed by Vaaru Academy.  Please reach vaaruacademy@gmail.com
